author: Jessica
excerpt: 1. I’m in full blown christmas movie mode. And music mode! Pentatonix on repeat. 2. Theme every work day for productivity. I’ve worked on a block schedule for over a decade and it works great. 3. It’s also N*SYNC christmas season and I just have to say that a few weeks ago Max asked me […]
text: 1. I’m in full blown christmas movie mode. And music mode! Pentatonix on repeat. 2. Theme every work day for productivity. I’ve worked on a block schedule for over a decade and it works great. 3. It’s also N*SYNC christmas season and I just have to say that a few weeks ago Max asked me if I knew who they were. HA! 4. Knowing when enough is enough. 5. TV things! Yellowstone premier… ugh! I knew it wouldn’t be great but still. 6. Also, the Target christmas commercial titled “happier holidays” – it’s magical. 7. 9 things we learned from the Martha documentary! 8. Thanksgiving table question: do one giant table to seat 20+? Or do two to three round tables? I love round table conversation, but not table decor. 9. I just about lost it when I saw that lenox re-released the spice village! Ahhhhh. Cutest ever.
html:
1. I’m in full blown christmas movie mode. And music mode! Pentatonix on repeat.

2. Theme every work day for productivity. I’ve worked on a block schedule for over a decade and it works great.

3. It’s also N*SYNC christmas season and I just have to say that a few weeks ago Max asked me if I knew who they were. HA!

4. Knowing when enough is enough.

5. TV things! Yellowstone premier… ugh! I knew it wouldn’t be great but still.

6. Also, the Target christmas commercial titled “happier holidays” – it’s magical.

7. 9 things we learned from the Martha documentary!

8. Thanksgiving table question: do one giant table to seat 20+? Or do two to three round tables? I love round table conversation, but not table decor.

9. I just about lost it when I saw that lenox re-released the spice village! Ahhhhh. Cutest ever.
